    • Method Detail

      • PeerToPeerPush

        PeerToPeerOperation PeerToPeerPush(PeerToPeerOperation p2pOperation)
                                   throws KineticException
        Perform Peer to Peer push operation.

        Unless the p2p operation cannot be completed for all the operations, the method does not throw an KineticException. Instead, the overall status is set and can be obtained with PeerToPeerOperation.getStatus() API.

        Applications check the overall status and if it is set to false, the individual status can be obtained from PeerToPeerOperation.getOperationList().

        Parameters:
        p2pOperation - specification to perform peer to peer operation.
        Returns:
        PeerToPeerOperation that contains status for each P2P operation.
        Throws:
        KineticException - if any internal error occurred.
        See Also:
        PeerToPeerOperation
